name: Language Selector
description: One-click language selection for anime and media playback with AniWorld-style flag buttons
overview: Adds flag buttons to episode pages for instant playback with selected audio/subtitle combinations. Perfect for anime fans who want quick access to German audio, Japanese audio with German subs, or English subs.

versions.changelog:
Initial release
- One-click language selection with flag buttons
- Support for German, Japanese, and English audio/subtitles
- AniWorld-inspired UI design
- Automatic language detection from media streams
- REST API endpoint for language options
